title: Jean-Claude Van Geenberghe
data: Jean-Claude Van Geenberghe (17 November 1962 â€“ 9 May 2009) was a Belgian-Ukrainian equestrian who competed in the sport of show jumping. He competed in the 1998, 1992, and 2008 Summer Olympics. While competing for Ukraine, Van Geenberghe resided in Donetsk. He died from heart attack[1] and is buried in Belgium.
